summary: Make the Nettlebane a more decent reward.
descriptionHtml:
This mod changes the Nettlebane have an enchantment which causes fire damage to Spriggans, to hopefully make it a useful situational weapon. Nothing in the original files is touched except for the Nettlebane weapon.

=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
INSTALLATION
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
Recommended: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1334/?]Mod Organizer[/url] or Nexus Mod Manager
[list][*][size=2]Use the "Download with Manager" button on the download page and install.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Choose whichever compatibility patches in the installer that apply.[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]
Manually:
[list][*][size=2]Copy "mowNettlebane.esp" from the "00 Core" folder into your "Skyrim\Data" folder.[/size][/*]
[/list]Manually with patches:[list][*][size=2]If you use Requiem the Roleplaying Overhaul, copy the "mowNettlebane - Requiem.esp" file over from the "01 Requiem AOS" folder.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]If you use Audio Overhaul for Skyrim 2, copy the "mowNettlebane - AOS.esp" file over.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]If you use BOTH Requiem and Audio Overhaul, only copy over the "mowNettlebane - Requiem+AOS.esp" file.[/size][/*]
[/list][/size]
[b][color=#ff0000]!! IMPORTANT !![/color]
[/b]Make sure the "mowNettlebane.esp" file comes BEFORE any of its compatibility patches in the load order.

=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
ENB - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24828/?]BLEAK ENB[/url]﻿
Spriggan Texture - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?]aMidianBorn Book of Silence (Creatures)[/url]
author: Mowsey
